about_the_game:
Control two cute dragons at the same time in a voluminous puzzle game.

"DragonMirroreD" is a puzzle + adventure game featuring two dragons, Hyoga and Magma, who are trapped in a mysterious house.

The house contains over 300 puzzle "rooms". Once inside the "rooms," Hyoga and Magma will move symmetrically.

The puzzle is cleared when all of the orbs, called crystals, with various characteristics in the "rooms" are picked up.

Many unique gimmicks may block your way. Sometimes you have to use them against them to solve the puzzle.

When you get tired of solving puzzles, check out the ones around there like in RPG games, and you will enjoy the relaxed exchange between the two dragons.

You may even find out the identity of the mysterious house.

Rule

After entering the "House of Mystery," Hyoga and Magma find a door inside the "House of Mystery". Once inside the door, they are transported to a mysterious space. From there, the "mirror-image" puzzle begins.

Hyoga and Magma move symmetrically.

(During the puzzle, you control Hyoga. Magma moves in conjunction with Hyoga's movements.)

Using blocks to shift the positions of Hyoga and Magma, collect the crystals (orbs on pedestals) in the room. The puzzle is completed when all the crystals are collected.

There are several types of crystals.

The black crystal can be taken by either Hyoga or Magma touching it.

The blue crystal (diamond-shaped symbols) can be taken by touching both Hyoga and Magma at the same time.

The red crystals (heart-shaped symbols) can be taken by touching the red crystals separately by Hyoga and Magma.

There are also many gimmicks that interfere or help with the puzzle.

Light blue switches lower light blue fences and make them passable.

Purple switches build bridges and make holes passable.

The cracked glass floor can only be ridden once.

Even when they do appear, they will be explained, and the game will go through a tutorial before being applied.

I have also confirmed that it works on Windows 11.

Please save your data regularly.

**Broadcasting Policy**

Feel free to use it as long as it does not offend public order and morals.

I would appreciate it if you could post a link to this game in the overview section, etc. as an introduction to the game.

**Credit**

Ryuhan

Fumiya Akamiya

GOH

Flow

Risu Shirai

Tatt

Rikyuta Ogura​

Toyohara Kasumi

​**Guest Actors**

Noname

PESTRiCA

​**Free Plug-in**

wood penguin

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSR X 10.10 or later (macOS Big Sur 11.0 or later is not supported)
  • Processor: intel core2 duo (or equivalent) or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL capable GPU
  • Additional Notes: Save your data often! セーブはこまめにしてね！

name: DragonMirroreD with Hyoga & Magma

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: intel core2 duo (or equivalent) or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 (or more) display/ Save your data often! セーブはこまめにしてね！

short_description: The two dragons, the main characters, move symmetrically during the puzzle as if they are mirror images of each other. Over 300 puzzles appear in the game. As the game progresses, various gimmicks appear one after another.
